  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:aspect:eri/10023</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>aspect:eri/10023</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv uporabe orodij informacijske tehnologije na ergonomijo in zdravje</string>
            <string language="en">The impact of information technology tools on ergonomics and health</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Auswirkung der 
Informationstechnologiehilfsmittel auf Ergonomie und Gesundheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'impact des outils de technologie de 
l'information sur l'ergonomie et la santé</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O impacto de ferramentas da tecnologia de 
informação no ergonomics e na saúde</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto degli strumenti di tecnologia 
dell'informazione su ergonomia e su salute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο αντίκτυπος των εργαλείων τεχνολογίας πληροφοριών 
στην εργονομία και την υγεία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El impacto de las herramientas de la tecnología 
de información en la ergonómica y la salud</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o vplivu uporabe orodij informacijske tehnologije na ergonomijo in zdravje v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: delovno okolje, ergonomija, zdravje, pravilna drža.</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about the impact of information technology tools on ergonomics and health, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: working environment, ergonomics, health, correct setup of enviroment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">ergonomija</string>
            <string language="en">ergonomics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zdravje</string>
            <string language="en">health</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">delovno okolje</string>
            <string language="en">work environment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über die Auswirkung der 
Informationstechnologiehilfsmittel auf Ergonomie und Gesundheit, Teil 
Ematerialien für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt: 
Arbeitsbereich, Ergonomie, Gesundheit, korrekte Installation von
enviroment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet de l'impact des outils de 
technologie de l'information sur l'ergonomie et la santé, d'une 
partie d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et de l'informatique. 
Contenu de chapitre : environnement de fonctionnement, 
ergonomie, santé, installation correcte d'enviroment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre o impacto de ferramentas da 
tecnologia de informação no ergonomics e na saúde, a parte dos 
e-materiais para a informática de e o informatics. Índices do 
capítulo: ambiente de funcionamento, ergonomics, saúde, 
instalação correta do enviroment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa l'effetto degli strumenti di 
tecnologia dell'informazione su ergonomia e su salute facente parte i 
e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. Soddisfare di 
capitolo: luogo di lavoro, ergonomia, salute, messa a punto 
corretta del enviroment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για τον αντίκτυπο των εργαλείων τεχνολογίας 
πληροφοριών στην εργονομία και την υγεία, μέρος των ε-υλικών για 
την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. Περιεχόμενο κεφαλαίου: 
εργασιακό περιβάλλον, εργονομία, υγεία, σωστή οργάνωση του
enviroment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre el impacto de las herramientas de
la tecnología de información en la ergonómica y la salud, la parte 
de los e-materiales para la informática y la informática. 
Contenido del capítulo: entorno de trabajo, ergonómica, 
salud, disposición correcta del enviroment.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ergonomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesundheit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arbeit Umgebung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ergonomie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">santé</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">environnement de travail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ergonomics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">saúde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ambiente do trabalho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ergonomia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">salute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ambiente del lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εργονομία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υγεία</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ambiente del trabajo</string>
          </keyword>
